# Performance Benchmarks

Controller performance benchmarks, optimization results, and comparative analysis for the DIP SMC PSO framework.

## Overview

This section provides detailed performance benchmarks for all controller types, including settling time, overshoot, control effort, and computational efficiency metrics.

## Controller Benchmarks

```{toctree}
:maxdepth: 1
:caption: Performance Analysis

```
